title: How many theaters are there on Broadway? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are currently 40 theaters that qualify as "Broadway theaters." These are the ones where the productions are eligible for Tony awards. The general rule of thumb is that if the theater is in midtown Manhattan, has more than 500 seats, and regularly shows live performances, then it's a Broadway theater.  Here's the list (via the Broadway League).
